verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye now what the YY <WH3068> saith <WH559> <WH8802>; Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, contend <WH7378> <WH8798> thou before the mountains <WH2022>, and let the hills <WH1389> hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thy voice <WH6963>.

Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye, O mountains <WH2022>, the YY'S <WH3068> controversy <WH7379>, and ye strong <WH386> foundations <WH4146> of the earth <WH776>: for the YY <WH3068> hath a controversy <WH7379> with his people <WH5971>, and he will plead <WH3198> <WH8691> with Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
O my people <WH5971>, what have I done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto thee? and wherein have I wearied <WH3811> <WH8689> thee? testify <WH6030> <WH8798> against me.

For I brought thee up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and redeemed <WH6299> <WH8804> thee out of the house <WH1004> of servants <WH5650>; and I sent <WH7971> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee Mosheh <WH4872>, Aharon <WH175>, and Miryam <WH4813>.

O my people <WH5971>, remember <WH2142> <WH8798> now what Balak <WH1111> king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124> consulted <WH3289> <WH8804>, and what Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> answered <WH6030> <WH8804> him from Shittim <WH7851> unto Gilgal <WH1537>; that ye may know <WH3045> <WH8800> the righteousness <WH6666> of the YY <WH3068>.

Wherewith shall I come before <WH6923> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068>, and bow <WH3721> <WH8735> myself before the high <WH4791> 'Elohim <WH430>? shall I come before <WH6923> <WH8762> him with burnt offerings <WH5930>, with calves <WH5695> of a year <WH8141> old <WH1121> ?

Will the YY <WH3068> be pleased <WH7521> <WH8799> with thousands <WH505> of rams <WH352>, or with ten thousands <WH7233> of rivers <WH5158> of oil <WH8081>? shall I give <WH5414> <WH8799> my firstborn <WH1060> for my transgression <WH6588>, the fruit <WH6529> of my body <WH990> for the sin <WH2403> of my soul <WH5315> ?

He hath shewed <WH5046> <WH8689> thee, O man <WH120>, what is good <WH2896>; and what doth the YY <WH3068> require <WH1875> <WH8802> of thee, but to do <WH6213> <WH8800> justly <WH4941>, and to love <WH160> mercy <WH2617>, and to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> humbly <WH6800> <WH8687> with thy 'Elohim <WH430> ?

The YY'S <WH3068> voice <WH6963> crieth <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the city <WH5892>, and the man of wisdom <WH8454> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> thy name <WH8034>: hear <WH8085> <WH8798> ye the rod <WH4294>, and who hath appointed <WH3259> <WH8804> it.

Are there <WH786> yet the treasures <WH214> of wickedness <WH7562> <WH8676> <WH376> in the house <WH1004> of the wicked <WH7563>, and the scant <WH7332> measure <WH374> that is abominable <WH2194> <WH8803> ?
Shall I count them pure <WH2135> <WH8799> with the wicked <WH7562> balances <WH3976>, and with the bag <WH3599> of deceitful <WH4820> weights <WH68> ?

For the rich men <WH6223> thereof are full <WH4390> <WH8804> of violence <WH2555>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> thereof have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> lies <WH8267>, and their tongue <WH3956> is deceitful <WH7423> in their mouth <WH6310>.
Therefore also will I make thee sick <WH2470> <WH8689> in smiting <WH5221> <WH8687> thee, in making thee desolate <WH8074> <WH8687> because of thy sins <WH2403>.

Thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799>, but not be satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799>; and thy casting down <WH3445> shall be in the midst <WH7130> of thee; and thou shalt take hold <WH5253> <WH8686>, but shalt not deliver <WH6403> <WH8686>; and that which thou deliverest <WH6403> <WH8762> will I give up <WH5414> <WH8799> to the sword <WH2719>.

Thou shalt sow <WH2232> <WH8799>, but thou shalt not reap <WH7114> <WH8799>; thou shalt tread <WH1869> <WH8799> the olives <WH2132>, but thou shalt not anoint <WH5480> <WH8799> thee with oil <WH8081>; and sweet wine <WH8492>, but shalt not drink <WH8354> <WH8799> wine <WH3196>.

For the statutes <WH2708> of Omri <WH6018> are kept <WH8104> <WH8691>, and all the works <WH4639> of the house <WH1004> of Ach'av <WH256>, and ye walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in their counsels <WH4156>; that I should make <WH5414> <WH8800> thee a desolation <WH8047>, and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> thereof an hissing <WH8322>: therefore ye shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the reproach <WH2781> of my people <WH5971>.
